Container.Name: Zigbee2MqttAssistant (GUI Interface)
Container.Overview: [p]This project is a Web GUI for the very good [a href='https://www.zigbee2mqtt.io/']Zigbee2Mqtt[/a] software
Container.Description: [p]This container is essentially a port of the official [a href='https://mosquitto.org/']Eclipse Mosquitto[/a] Docker container but with a base image of lsiobase/alpine.[/p] [h4]Configuration[/h4] [p]To set up paths and ports, see the descriptions in the unRAID docker settings page.[/p] [p]To further control mosquitto configuration, place a [code]mosquitto.conf[/code] file in the config path, or start the container one time and it will write a template [code]mosquitto.conf.example[/code] file to the config path for you to copy and edit. For further details, refer to the full README at [a href='https://github.com/cmccambridge/mosquitto-unraid/blob/master/README.md']https://github.com/cmccambridge/mosquitto-unraid/blob/master/README.md[/a][/p]
